v.v: This is a message that Yahweh gave to Isaiah son of Amoz, in a vision about Judah and Jerusalem.
In the future, the hill on which Yahweh’s temple is built

v: will be the most important place on the earth.
It will be as though it is the highest mountain,
as though it has been raised up above all other hills,
and people from all over the world will come there.

v.v: People from many people groups will say to each other,
Yahweh will listen to the disputes between nations,
You descendants of Jacob,
Yahweh, you have abandoned us, your people
Israel is full of silver and gold;
But the land is also full of idols;
So now they will be humbled;
All you people should crawl into the caves in the rock cliffs!
Yahweh will cause you people to no longer be arrogant
Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, has chosen a day
He will get rid of all those who think others should admire them, like the tall cedar trees in Lebanon,
He will get rid of all those who think they are as great as all the high hills,
He will get rid of all those who think that they are like high towers
He will destroy all those who are rich because they own big ships that carry goods to other countries
He will cause people to no longer be arrogant,
All idols will disappear then.
When Yahweh comes to terrify the people on the earth,
On that day, people will get rid of all their gold and silver idols
Then they will crawl into caves
So do not trust that people will save you,
Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, is about to take away from Jerusalem and other places in Judah
He will take away heroes and other soldiers,
army officers and other important people,
Yahweh says, “I will appoint boys to be leaders;
People will treat each other cruelly:
At that time, someone will grab one of his brothers in his father’s house and say to him,
But his brother will reply,
The people in Jerusalem and the other towns in Judah have disobeyed God,
They even show on their faces that they oppose Yahweh.
You people must tell the righteous people that good things will happen to them;
But terrible things will happen to wicked people;
Youths who have become leaders treat my people cruelly,
It is as though Yahweh had taken his place in a courtroom
He will stand up to declare why he should punish the elders and rulers of his people;
You should stop making my people suffer.

v: “Come, let us go up to the hill,
to the temple of Yahweh,
to worship the God whom Jacob worshiped.
There he will teach us what he desires us to know,
in order that our behavior will please him.”
They will teach us in Jerusalem;
we will learn there what Yahweh desires to tell us.
